description: This file defines routing logic for a Flutter app, including route names and a widget builder map, as well as argument passing for navigation.

classes.name: AppRoutes
classes.description: Contains static route definitions and a route map for the application.

classes.name: NoteDetailArgs
classes.description: A class to encapsulate arguments passed to the note detail page, specifically the noteId.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: A getter that returns a map of route names to widget builder functions, used for navigation.
